content.raw:
It looks like there is a long [queue](http://build.osrfoundation.org/view/main/view/CI%20any%20jobs/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-trusty-amd64-gpu-nvidia/) on Jenkins. I've tested it locally and it looks warning free. I guess it's safe to approve. 

Oh and I ran code checker locally, which I hadn't in a long time, and got a few style errors unrelated to this PR....

~~~
[gazebo/common/EnumIface_TEST.cc:85]: (performance) Prefer prefix ++/-- operators for non-primitive types.
[gazebo/common/EnumIface_TEST.cc:110]: (performance) Prefer prefix ++/-- operators for non-primitive types.
cppcheck: No C or C++ source files found.
./gazebo/physics/Model.cc:1357:  Weird number of spaces at line-start.  Are you using a 2-space indent?  [whitespace/indent] [3]
Total errors found: 1
~~~
content.html:
It looks like there is a long queue on Jenkins. I've tested it locally and it looks warning free. I guess it's safe to approve.

Oh and I ran code checker locally, which I hadn't in a long time, and got a few style errors unrelated to this PR....
